data.eml:eml: Two new species of Tydeidae (Acari: Prostigmata) associated with stingless bees

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Da-Costa, Tairis, Rodighero, Luana Fabrina, Silva, Guilherme Liberato Da, Ferla, Noeli Juarez, Blochtein, Betina (2019): Two new species of Tydeidae (Acari: Prostigmata) associated with stingless bees. Zootaxa 4652 (1): 101-112, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4652.1.4
